purpleculture_pinyin:
xū
emptiness; void; abstract theory or guiding principles; empty or unoccupied; diffident or timid; false; humble or modest; (of health) weak; virtual; in vain
пустота; пустота; абстрактная теория или руководящие принципы; пустые или незанятые; застенчивый или робкий; ложный; скромный или скромный; (здоровья) слабый; виртуальный; напрасно

heisig_chinese_memo: Tiger's are afraid of nothing?  False.  This tiger tried to take a bite of a cactus and now he's terrified of them.
Ru_trainchinese:
xū: (прил/нареч) робкий, застенчивый; слабый; зря, напрасно
xū: (графема) пустой, порожний; скромный; ложный; главный принцип; пустота; (кит. мед.) нехватка
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A tiger profession at the circus involves 'taming' the tiger.  This is a false hope because a tiger can never be truly tamed.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " Qiu ", "虍" sound. The original meaning is Daqiu, namely Dashan. "Shuowen": "Xu, Daqiu also. Kunweiqiu is called Kunweixu." Duan Yucai's note: "Kunlunqiu, Qiu is the greatest." Such as "Poetry. The wind. "Ding Zhi Fang Zhong": "to raise the other emptiness, to look at the Chu." " Xu " or increase " earth " next to " xu ", and later use " xu " to express the meaning of the big hill. "Er Ya. "Explanation": "Hei, Xu Ye." Hao Yi's commentary: "Xu, today is the ruins. The ancient word for no ruins is based on the ruins of the ruins, and later generations add soil to the ruins to distinguish them from the emptiness, so the classics are also Change the imaginary to the ruins."

" Xu " means old city, ruins. Such as "Yi Zhou Shu. "Wen Zheng": "Nothing is unreasonable, nothing is undefeated." Kong Chao's note: "No one in the country says nothing is empty." "Xunzi. "Ai Gong": "The king goes out of the four gates of Lu to look at the outskirts of Lu, and the emptiness of the country must be covered." It also said that it was made into ruins. Such as Mawangdui silk book "Jingfa. Lines 9-10 of Guoci: "Forbidden logging is a crime and death, and (the ruins) Qi (its) country must be emptied."

The extension of " imaginary " means emptiness, as opposed to " real ". Duan Yucai's "Shuowen Jiezi Zhu": "The empty original is called Daqiu, but the big one is empty, so the extension is empty." And "Guangya. Interpretation III: "Empty, empty." Such as "The Analects. "Tab": "If there is nothing, if there is nothing, if it is true, it is not a school." "Confucius's Family Language. "Three Forgiveness": "I hear that you sit on the device, if it is empty, it will be clear, the middle will be upright, and the full will be overturned." It can also be used as a verb, meaning to make it empty. Such as "Lao Tzu. Chapter Three: "The rule of the saint is to weaken one's heart and strengthen one's belly; weaken one's ambition, strengthen one's bones."

" Void " also means insufficiency or defect. Such as "Zhou Yi. "Loss": "Sometimes the gains and losses are soft, but the gains and losses are full and empty, and go with the times." "Zhuangzi. "Autumn Water": "To observe the surplus and emptiness, so the gain is not happy, the loss is not worried, and the impermanence of division is also known."

" Void " means holes and voids. "Er Ya. Shi Guxia: "Xu, Jian Ye." Such as "Grandson. "Empty and Reality": "Those who can not be defended, then go to the emptiness; those who can not be chased back, speed and cannot be reached." "Huainanzi. "Pan Theory": "If you go in and out of the emptiness, you will not be able to carry it." Gao You's note: "The emptiness, the hole is also."

" Xu " means humility and dissatisfaction. Such as "Zhou Yi. "Xian": "A gentleman accepts others by emptiness." "Huainanzi. Original Dao: "Thus, those who have gained the Dao are weak and strong, but should be guilty."

" Virtual " also extends to mean false and untrue. Such as "The Songs of the Chu. Chapter Nine. "Thinking": "Goodness cannot come from outside, and the name cannot be faked." "Zhan Guo Ce. "Han Ceyi": "Relying on the imaginary name of Chu, and ignoring the enemy of Qin, we will laugh for the world."

" Xu " means weakness. Such as "Su Wen. "Wu Zang Special Theory": "So, if the water enters the valley, the stomach is solid and the intestines are weak; if you eat, the intestines are solid and the stomach is weak." "Shen Nong's Materia Medica. Zhongjing. "Bamboo Leaf": "The root is used as a soup to replenish qi and quench thirst, tonic and lower qi."

" Xu " is one of the twenty-eight lodges, also known as "Xuanchan", and is the fourth lodge of the seven Xuanwu lodges in the north. "Er Ya. Shi Tian: "Xuan Chan, Xu Ye." Such as "Shang Shu. "Yao Dian": "The star is empty in the night, with Yin Zhongqiu." Kong Chuan: "Xu, the star in the Xuanwu." "Lu Shi Chunqiu. "Yi Shi": "The north is called Xuantian, and its star-women, virtual, dangerous, and camp."

" Xu " can be used as an adverb, meaning vain and vain. Such as "Han Shu. "The Biography of Kuang Zhang Kong Horse": "The officials hate the country for releasing Lecheng's deeds, and for this reason." Li Shangyin of the Tang Dynasty "Anding City Tower": "Jia Sheng was young when he was young, Wang Canchun came to travel farther."

" Void " can also be compared to the sky. For example, Ruan Ji of the Three Kingdoms "Yong Huai Poetry": "Send Yan in the sky, wave your sleeves and fly in the sky." "On the vulgar": "Based on the history of the Xiao, the phoenix will fly with the lingering emptiness, and the qin will ride the Zhu carp in the abyss.
humanum_short_description_en: From " Qiu ", "虍" sound. The original meaning is Daqiu, namely Dashan.
humanum_full_description:
從「丘」，「虍」聲。本義是大丘，即大山。《說文》：「虛，大丘也。崐崘丘謂之崐崘虛。」段玉裁注：「昆侖丘，丘之至大者也。」如《詩．鄘風．定之方中》：「升彼虛矣，以望楚矣。」「虛」或增「土」旁作「墟」，後多用「墟」表示大丘之義。《爾雅．釋詁上》：「壑，虛也。」郝懿行義疏：「虛，今作墟。古無墟字，皆以虛為墟也，後人虛旁加土以別於空虛，因而經典亦多改虛為墟。」

　　「虛」表示故城、廢墟。如《逸周書．文政》：「無由不通，無虛不敗。」孔晁注：「國無人謂之虛也。」《荀子．哀公》：「君出魯之四門以望魯四郊，亡國之虛則必有數蓋焉。」又表示使之成為廢墟。如馬王堆帛書《經法．國次》第9-10行：「禁伐當罪當亡，必虛（墟）亓（其）國。」

　　「虛」引申表示空虛，與「實」相對。段玉裁《說文解字注》：「虛本謂大丘，大則空曠，故引伸之爲空虛。」又《廣雅．釋詁三》：「虛，空也。」如《論語．泰伯》：「有若無，實若虛，犯而不校。」《孔子家語．三恕》：「吾聞宥坐之器，虛則欹，中則正，滿則覆。」亦可作動詞，表示使之空虛。如《老子．第三章》：「是以聖人之治，虛其心，實其腹；弱其志，強其骨。」

　　「虛」也表示不足、缺損。如《周易．損》：「損剛益柔有時，損益盈虛，與時偕行。」《莊子．秋水》：「察乎盈虛，故得而不喜，失而不憂，知分之無常也。」

　　「虛」表示孔洞、空隙。《爾雅．釋詁下》：「虛，間也。」如《孫子．虛實》：「進而不可禦者，衝其虛也；退而不可追者，速而不可及也。」《淮南子．氾論》：「若循虛而出入，則亦無能履也。」高誘注：「虛，孔竅也。」

　　「虛」表示謙虛、不自滿。如《周易．咸》：「君子以虛受人。」《淮南子．原道》：「故得道者志弱而事強，心虛而應當。」

　　「虛」也引申表示虛妄、不真實。如《楚辭．九章．抽思》：「善不由外來兮，名不可以虛作。」《戰國策．韓策一》：「恃楚之虛名，輕絕強秦之敵，必為天下笑矣。」

　　「虛」表示虛弱。如《素問．五藏別論》：「所以然者，水穀入口，則胃實而腸虛；食下，則腸實而胃虛。」《神農本草經．中經．竹葉》：「根作湯，益氣止渴，補虛下氣。」

　　「虛」是二十八宿之一，又名「玄枵」，為北方玄武七宿的第四宿。《爾雅．釋天》：「玄枵，虛也。」如《尚書．堯典》：「宵中星虛，以殷仲秋。」孔傳：「虛，玄武之中星。」《呂氏春秋．有始》：「北方曰玄天，其星婺女、虛、危、營室。」

　　「虛」可作副詞，表示徒然、白白地。如《漢書．匡張孔馬傳》：「臣竊恨國家釋樂成之業，而虛為此紛紛也。」唐代李商隱〈安定城樓〉：「賈生年少虛垂涕，王粲春來更遠遊。」

　　「虛」還可比喻天空。如三國魏阮籍〈詠懷詩〉：「寄顏雲霄間，揮袖凌虛翔。」《抱撲子．對俗》：「是以蕭史偕翔鳳以凌虛，琴高乘朱鯉於深淵，斯其驗也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「丘」，「虍」聲。本義是大丘，即大山。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
虛 (Simplified: 虚)
Pinyin: xū
English Definition: emptiness; void; abstract theory or guiding principles; empty or unoccupied; diffident or timid; false; humble or modest; (of health) weak; virtual; in vain
Antonyms: 實
Total strokes: 12; Radical: 虍
Ideographic: A tiger 虍 stalking in the bushes 丱
Character Formation:
  • ⿸ Surround from upper left
    • 虍 [ hū ] tiger
    • ⿱ Above to below
      • 丱 [ guàn ] a child's hair bound in two tufts; ore
      • 一 [ yī ] one; a, an; alone
Example Words:
虛假 [ xū jiǎ ]: false; phony; pretense
虛擬 [ xū nǐ ]: to imagine; to make up; fictitious; theoretical; hypothetical; (computing) to emulate; virtual
虛偽 [ xū wěi ]: false; hypocritical; artificial; sham
More: 虛* | *虛 | *虛*

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+865A

Main pronunciation 主要发音: xū

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning (orig) hill (now) empty or weak.

English senses 英语理解: Hill

Usage example 用法举例: 謙虛 qiān xū (modest) 虛數 Xūshù (imaginary number)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 1042

Shuowen 说文解字:

Compound 虗虚虛 from hill 丘㐀 qiū and related phonetic tiger-head 虍 hū. (name- empty-tiger 虗虚虛 xū)

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :
(- tigers can be found in the hills)

xu1
HSK 3: 需,须,須,鬚
HSK 5: 虚,虛
HSK 6: 吁,墟
虛虛RS
虚虚 		虗 𠧝 𣦄 𧆳 虚 void, emptiness, unpreparedness, crack, fissure, false
  • place on the mountains 㐀 where the tiger 虍 dwells 𣦄 → 虛 → 虚: emptiness with cracks and fissures in the ground
(Simplified: 虚)
Chinese Definition: Antonyms: 實
Ideographic: A tiger 虍 stalking in the bushes 丱
  • ⿸ Surround from upper left
    • 虍 [ hū ] tiger
    • ⿱ Above to below
      • 丱 [ guàn ] a child's hair bound in two tufts; ore
      • 一 [ yī ] one; a, an; alone
①空：虛無。虛實。虛度。虛名。虛左(尊敬地空出左邊的座位，古代以左爲尊)。空虛。乘虛而入。
②不真實的：虛僞。虛假。虛妄。虛驚。虛誇。虛構。虛傳。虛張聲勢。
③內心怯懦：做賊心虛。
④不自滿：虛心。謙虛。虛懷若谷(喻對人十分謙虛)。
⑤抽象的：虛詞。
⑥衰弱：虛弱。虛胖。虛汗。虛脫。氣虛。血虛。
⑦星名，二十八宿之一。
⑧古同“墟”，大丘。
⑨古同“圩”，集市。
虛假 [ xū jiǎ ]: false; phony; pretense
虛擬 [ xū nǐ ]: to imagine; to make up; fictitious; theoretical; hypothetical; (computing) to emulate; virtual
虛偽 [ xū wěi ]: false; hypocritical; artificial; sham
(Simplified: 虚)
Chinese Definition: Antonyms: 實
Ideographic: A tiger 虍 stalking in the bushes 丱
HSK: 5
Freq: 4890
Chinese: Tiger's are afraid of nothing? False. This tiger tried to take a bite of a cactus and now he's terrified of them.
Meaning: FALSE
Hanzi: 虚
Story: A tiger profession at the circus involves 'taming' the tiger. This is a false hope because a tiger can never be truly tamed.
Kind: traditional

虛字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虍字部】　虛； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1074第11
〔古文〕?【唐韻】朽居切【集韻】【正韻】休居切，?音噓。空虛也。　又【易·繫辭傳】周流六虛。【註】六虛，六位也。【疏】位本無體，因爻始見，故稱虛也。　又【大戴禮】虛土之人大。【註】虛，縱也。　又孤虛。【史記·龜筴傳】日辰不全，故有孤虛。　又星名。【書·堯典】宵中星虛。　又姓。【通志·氏族略】虛氏。見《姓苑》。　又虛無，山名。【顏氏家訓】柏人城東有一孤山，或呼爲虛無山。　又【廣韻】去魚切，音祛。【說文】大丘也。【集韻】古者九夫爲井，四井爲邑，四邑爲丘，丘謂之虛。　又地名。【春秋·桓十二年】會宋公于虛。【註】宋地。　又水名。【前漢·地理志】琅邪郡虛水。　又次也。【晉語】實沉之虛，晉人是居。　又【韻補】喜語切，音許。《毛詩》升彼虛矣，以望楚矣。　又叶虛王切。【道藏歌】提攜高上賔，反吾素靈房。道場靈沫內，高歌登大虛。【干祿字書】通作虚。
